parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Fuel Tank Defects and Safety Recall Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Defects in the fuel tank and gas cap can cause fuel leaks, which can lead to fires, accidents, and injuries. The refusal of dealerships to properly address these issues can exacerbate the problem and put riders at risk.
symptoms: distraction while driving due to noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Dealership Response to Safety Recalls
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of dealerships to properly respond to safety recalls can delay necessary repairs, putting riders at risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: requiring riders to repair the problem themselves
refusing to tow the vehicle to the dealership
and downplaying the severity of the issue.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the stator rectifier can cause the motorcycle to lose power, resulting in engine stalling, and potentially leaving the rider stranded. This can lead to accidents, especially if the failure occurs at high speeds.
The kickstand design flaw can cause the motorcycle to fall over, even on a slight incline, which can result in damage to the vehicle, injury to the rider, and potentially lead to accidents.
symptoms: The kickstand does not deploy far enough to hold the bike on an incline
the kickstand does not lock in place
the motorcycle falls over when the kickstand is engaged.
